text:
="preserve">The Hawker Hart was an airplane from the 1920s. It was a British plane with two sets of wings, a light bomber. Two people could ride in the plane, a pilot and a gunner. The Royal Air Force used the Hawker Hart. It was designed during the 1920s by Sydney Camm and built by Hawker Aircraft.
Engineers used the Hawker Hart to test new airplane engines.

annotations.surface_form: plane with two sets of wings
